abstrac: Line editing specialist. "The world is full of words. Finding the right words requires skill and obsession." - Lee Caleca
bio:
"Line Editing isn't about correction; it's showing the writer the power of his or her voice."

Award-winning author and book award judge, I routinely exceed client expectations with all the research and attention to detail you should expect from a top editor and writer.

I edit for structure, redundancy, irrelevant or ineffective words, and the overall readability of your writing.

I've edited hundreds of submissions and have a prolific practice covering several career fields.

Recently retired from one of the top U.S. communications companies, I deliver the equivalent experience of a full team of writing professionals to your assignment. I invest 60+ hours a week of commitment and dedication to my craft.

I've been writing and editing for more than 40 years, and my instinct for what makes good writing has been honed by many years of research, and personal experiences.

This is a pursuit of art, inspiration, and excellence. With diverse personal knowledge obtained from many years of professional, societal, and artistic endeavors, I provide a perspective rarely found in independent freelance writers.

You won't find a more thorough eye for detail, structure, and consistency. I'll make sure your project is clear and cohesive from the start, that your fiction maintains theme, plot and timelines, or that the opening to your nonfiction book presents a tangible thesis that expands throughout the content. I can illuminate what you've written and make it more engaging.

* Author: 2 published novels, 1 nonfiction book
* Ghostwriter and/or editor of more than two hundred fiction and non-fiction books
* Judge: Global Ebook Awards: category: Fiction: Mystery
* Judge: Eric Hoffer Awards: categories: Spiritual, Health, Business, Art, and Middle Reader
* B.A.Sc. Fashion Design & Merchandising - International Academy of Design and Technology-Nashville
* 2x Juice Award winner for Fresh Design and Outstanding use of Creative Perspective by IADT
* HubNuggets Award for best new writer

* Flat rate only.

SERVICES INCLUDE:

1) Line editing (copy editing and proofreading are included, but I do not do these editing phases outside of the line editing package)
2) Ghostwriting nonfiction only, depending on the subject
3) Developmental editing for nonfiction only, depending on the subject
4) Book evaluation (if I have also edited the book)

SERVICES NOT OFFERED:

1) Ghostwriting fiction
2) Copy editing and/or proofreading outside of the line editing package
3) Substantive rewrites outside the scope of line editing
4) Developmental editing for fiction

* Additional requests outside the original agreement will require additional funding.

abstrac: DESIGN AND BRANDING | WEB DEVELOPMENT | MOBILE DEVELOPMENT | DIGITAL MARKETING | BUSINESS PROCESS SOLUTIONS
bio:
DA Tech, a name presenting services of Design, Development, Digital Marketing and Business Process Solutions. Global scale with local experts! We are here to provide our clients with the best of our services to promote their brands through a rigorous and cost-effective online marketing program. SEO, content writing and business development are among the predominant services that we offer. As search engines and consumer buying behaviors evolve, they require a more comprehensive web marketing approach to connect with their customers easily without any wastage of time. DA unifies how brand acquires support and engage customers.

We boast of a team of highly qualified professionals with the requisite experience and proficiency in specific fields of design, development, digital marketing and business process solutions to ensure that you get a broad-based and top-notch customer experience.

Amena Khatun
